snippet: Commissioner Rob Manfred said the National League and the American League would bat last in alternating years in the All-Star Game, regardless of where it is played.
abstract: Major League Baseball Commissioner Rob Manfred announces that National League and American League will alternate batting last each year in All-Star Game regardless of where it is played.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Rob Manfred said the National League and the American League would bat last in alternating years in the All-Star Game, regardless of where it is played.
